name: Bat'Ifole
description:
Bat'Ifole -- brackeys game jam #2

Hello and welcome to this presentation of Bat'ifole !
So what is it ? It is a little arcade game in which you control a bat, trying to seduce his lover. But problem...you're blind !
Fortunately, you have your echolocalisation to find your way in all this mess !
Avoid water, collisions, grab flower and finally conquer the love of your life...

The name, Bat'ifole, is a pun between the word Bat and the french word batifoler.
It was done in a week for Brackeys Game Jam #2...we hope you like it !
